Today, Dan and Jordan stick around in the past to learn a bit about Alex Jones. In this installment, Alex floats an outrageous 9/11 conspiracy theory, misreports at least two Supreme Court decisions, and takes (bad) aim at UNESCO.

*Alex talks about Dr Cell ruling, lies
*Alex knows 3 drug dealing FBI agents

*Zacharias Mousawi wants to talk to Congress

*The planes only had 20% capacity

*Alex claims people were on planes
*Once caller is off phone, Alex goes back to empty plane narrative

*Nationalist Action League/ American Flag Commitee background

==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/10/14/episode-606-june-18-19-2003 Episode #606: June 18-19, 2003]</ref>:

*Alex hates cops and is ACAB
*Alex misrepresents the [https://supreme.justia.com/cases/federal/us/539/166/ Supreme Court decision] regarding the involuntary medicating of Dr. Charles Sell
*Alex discusses Jane Roe, who has come out against abortion, but would later say she just did that because [https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/style/jane-roe-from-roe-v-wade-made-a-stunning-deathbed-confession-now-what/2020/05/20/fad9d296-9a09-11ea-89fd-28fb313d1886_story.html anti-abortion groups paid her to]
*Alex misrepresents a Supreme Court decision in the case of [https://www.law.cornell.edu/supct/html/01-1444.ZO.html Chavez v. Martinez]
*Alex thinks that there were no passengers on the planes on 9/11
*Alex lies about the [https://web.archive.org/web/20121024095423/http://www.archives.gov/research/9-11/staff-report-sept2005.pdf number of passengers] on the planes on 9/11
*Alex reports on a [https://zannerman.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/unesco-toward-world-understanding.pdf UNESCO report from 1949] by reading [https://www.newsmax.com/pre-2008/unescostrangle-this-monster/2003/06/17/id/675953/ an op-ed in Newsmax]
*The outrage about this UNESCO report [https://books.google.com/books?dq=Toward%20World%20Understanding%20unesco&hl=en&id=mf8ZAQAAMAAJ&lpg=PA729&ots=nJq0CRjswE&pg=PA729&sa=X&sig=ACfU3U2BJ8pQn-JxCl6eyfg5B57GviZdcA&source=bl&ved=2ahUKEwjl1dTe-MjzAhVxYjUKHWFxC0oQ6AF6BAgQEAM#v=onepage&q=Toward%20World%20Understanding%20unesco&f=false traces back] to an old time anti-Semite named W. Henry McFarland
*W. Henry McFarland published [https://archive.org/details/macfarlandjr.williamhenryhq1057857/page/n8/mode/1up many very troubling newsletters]
*Congressman John Wood from Idaho (not Ohio, Dan misspoke) introduced the article that McFarland published in his newsletter for the American Flag Committee [https://books.google.com/books?dq=%22join%20with%20the%20american%20flag%20committee%20in%20demanding%20that%20your%20united%20states%20senators%22&hl=en&id=vBPSI3Ttv_wC&lpg=SL1-PA6552&ots=1tlumBbsba&pg=SL1-PA6552&sa=X&sig=ACfU3U03Eb1GWXxtm6rnNg0-nLXcxce7Yg&source=bl&ved=2ahUKEwi4mte9k8nzAhV2mHIEHT1XAc8Q6AF6BAgCEAM#v=onepage&q=%22join%20with%20the%20american%20flag%20committee%20in%20demanding%20that%20your%20united%20states%20senators%22&f=false into the Congressional Record] in 1951
*Alex interviews Jane Roe's lawyer, and the conversation is intensely gross
